story_parts.text: A lion was getting ready to go to Disney World. He was very excited and couldn't wait to go on all the rides and see all the shows. He packed his bags and got on the plane. When he arrived at Disney World, he was amazed. He went on all the rides and saw all the shows. He had a great time and met a lot of new friends.

next_options.0: The lion decides to stay at Disney World and live there forever
next_options.1: The lion goes home after a few days and tells all his friends about his amazing adventure

story_parts.text: The lion was so happy at Disney World that he decided to stay there forever. He made new friends and had a great time every day. He never got bored or homesick, and he was always happy.

next_options.0: The lion continued to live happily at Disney World, and everyone loved him
next_options.1: The lion missed his old home and decided to leave Disney World to go back to the wild

story_parts.text: The lion continued to live happily at Disney World, and everyone loved him. He was always happy and smiling, and he made everyone around him happy too. He was a great addition to Disney World, and he loved it there.

next_options.0: The lion continued to live happily at Disney World, and everyone loved him
next_options.1: One day, the lion got sick and had to be put down

quiz_parts.question: What made the lion happy at Disney World?

options.1: The lion's great time every day
options.2: The lion's lack of boredom or homesickness

quiz_parts.question: What made the lion a great addition to Disney World?

options.1: His ability to make everyone around him happy
